chunks.chunk_text: 這倒是很合理的,因為當你變得更全球化,像是Walmart,Target,BestBuy,你會想要找到最有效的供應,最有效的供應。所以在當地的購買辦公室,幫助你搜尋這些零件,搜尋供應者,並處理供應者。所以這很合理,讓他們來這裡開辦公室。

chunks.chunk_text: 你總是有一個目標就是做運動就是減肥或者增肥肌肉但也許你總是要享受比賽對嗎對我們忘記了我們現在想到玩遊戲我們玩電視遊戲我們玩網上遊戲我們玩手機遊戲但是三十年前四十年前在我房子裡在公園裡我朋友們和我我們就玩遊戲然後我們就拿一個球
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我們就玩我們就拿一個球然後就開始踢球對我會拿很多紙牌讓他們放在球上然後玩紙牌球對我們玩我們忘記玩遊戲現在所有東西都在手機上面所以對我真的喜歡我真的喜歡我真的喜歡最後我們再說一遍讓我馬上把問號交給Patrick和其他15分鐘的粉絲

chunks.chunk_text: We talked about Decathlon.We know it's the sporting event for the track and field sporting event in Olympics.So even in Chinese we say 十項全能Right?So there are 10 events.What are the 10?What are the 10 events for them to be called the Decathlon?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: In general these are events we call track and field.It happens on the track in the field.So either it's running or either it happens on the side of the track.So I give you guys a couple of hints.Right?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: So here are the 10.If you don't know here are the 10.In order for Decathlon.In order.This is in order of the events.These events take place in this order that I'm going to share with you.First event.100m dash.So we don't say 100m run.100m fast run.No.It's called the 100m dash.So this is the same bolt event.The 100m dash.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: 100m短跑.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: So 400m.Then it's a run.It's not a dash.The 6th event.110m hurdles.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: So hurdles are these little square obstacles that you have to jump over.So hurdles are also.You can use hurdles as in challenges or obstacles.But hurdles in track and field refers to that little M-shaped thing that you have to jump over.110m hurdles.After that.Discous throw.So shot put is that round metal ball.Discous is the disc.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: Discous.I think this is Greek for the word of disc.Something round.Because if I say the word I will pronounce discuss.Discuss comes with two S's.So discous only one S.Now the 8th event pole vault.So what is pole vault?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: You have this guy that's dashing with a long pole in his arms.And he has to lift himself up with the pole.That's called pole vault.So the thing you're holding is a pole.And vault is that action.You try to vault yourself over.So that trajectory.You know lifting up and going over.That's called vaulting.Yes.So pole vault.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: No.9 event javelin throw.So it's like an arrow that you throw out and it flies in the air javelin.And the last event the 1500m run.That's the last event.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.227_ 英語時光機-台灣人愛逛的豬腳滷體育專賣店與品牌 Did you know Decathlon is actually.json

chunks.chunk_text: So the official distance is 1500m.This is what I googled up.So I'm suppose it's 1500m.To break the world record.So the world record must be very tight for 1500m.So quick recap.First event 100m dash.Second long jump.Shot put.High jump.400m run.110m hurdles.Discous throw.Pole vault. Javelin throw.

chunks.chunk_text: And the 1500m run.So there's no bowl games inside.No bowl.Track and field.100% track and field.This happens on the field next to the track.So guys did you guess right?Do you know your decathlon events?So before we end let's wrap up today and we want to thank everybody for sending in all their members' requests for the topics and for all the ideas.
